segments.text: Not a lot . What about you ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm throwing a party on Friday .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Do you think you can come ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm sorry . I'm already doing something this Friday .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What are you going to be doing ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: My family and I are going to dinner .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I was hoping you would come .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'll definitely try to make it the next time .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: All right . I'll see you next time .
segments.speaker: S2
